lines.text:
[to Benji]
One of these days I'm going to follow you to see just where you go.

[Trying to solve the mystery of the disappearing pudding cups, Riley leaves an open container out]
I'm leaving it right here. On purpose.
And I'm sure it'll still be there tomorrow, and on purpose, too! Now, come on, let's go!

[to Benji]
You have more independence than most people, and more charm.

[calling out the kitchen door]
Cindy, he's here.
Well he won't be here for long if you don't stop that yelling. You know what happens if your father walks in.
I don't think Dad understands about us and Benji.
I don't think you understand what an understatement you just made.
It means don't yell down the hall.
Don't yell in the kitchen, do you want your father in here?
No but he's coming anyway, we've got to hide Benji!
